title: Animated Assault Rifle with Melee Attack
description: Ak-47 Animation Pack with Dynamic Camera Movements + Weapon Skins
longDescription:
Video Link:

Video

Demo Link:

Demo



Enhance your FPS game with 30 finely crafted Assault Rifle animations, featuring firing sequences, reloads, melee attacks, and seamless movement animations.

Ak47 animation pack designed exclusively for FPS game

A collection of meticulously crafted animations, totalling 30 distinct movements and actions that bring the iconic rifle to life in your FPS gameplay


Firing Animations:

·        8 distinct firing animations capture the AK-47's firepower, including options both with and without aiming down sights. Each animation offers dynamic perspectives to heighten player immersion.


4 Fire animations without aiming

4 Fire animations while aiming down sight



Reload Animations:

·        2 meticulously crafted animations—one for partially empty magazines and another for fully empty ones—adding depth and realism to your FPS game's mechanics.



Melee Attacks:

·        Explore the versatility of the AK-47 Assault Rifle with 2 engaging melee attack animations, seamlessly integrating the weapon into close combat scenarios.



Weapon Inspection:

·        Experience an in-depth weapon inspection animation, allowing characters to examine the AK 47 different angles, adding a stylish touch to your FPS gameplay.



Movement Animations:

·        Seamlessly transition between movements with walk, run, sprint, idle stance, and jump animations. Witness characters intuitively move the weapon away from obstacles, enhancing realism (Character holds the gun back to avoid hitting obstacles).



Audio Enhancements:

·        Elevate immersion with included firing and reload sound effects, enhancing the auditory experience for players of your FPS game.



Customisation Options (Gun Skins):

·        Tailor gameplay dynamics by adjusting recoil intensity, offering either a harder or softer kick. Easily switch between three pre-assigned weapon skins or implement custom gun skins for visual variety in your FPS game.



Camera Adjustments:

·        Detailed attention to camera movements ensures they complement each animation, guaranteeing a seamless and immersive FPS gameplay experience.



Visual Flair:

·        Amplify visual impact with Niagara Particle Systems for Muzzle Flash effects, adding a vivid touch to every shot fired in your FPS game.




Unleash the dynamic potential of the AK 47 in your FPS project with Unreal Engine. Elevate gameplay and immerse players in the raw power of this iconic weapon.
